website_summaries.verdict: This complete set includes the tools you need for beautiful gel manicures at an affordable price.
pros: Includes 5 colors, base and top coats, tools, and a portable UV and LED lamp
Has everything you need to create attractive, long-lasting gel manicures
cons: Color change polishes don't always work as expected, but the colors are still pretty
Some reports of polish being either too thick or too thin

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical at first, but Jesus this is amazing! Polish lasted forever and it’s super vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: ... gel myself for the first time this was a great option for a starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try to do gel myself for the first time this was a great option for a starter kit. It held up well especially since I clean for a living and my hands are in chemicals all day. I also did a friends who said they held up well after dealing with money all day. Can't wait to try the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth the buy. It is easy to do for beginners. The bottles of Polish are MUCH SMALLER then what I was expecting and wanted. Which is what I was a little disappointed about but again it’s for starters. The directions are clear and easy step by step on what to do to make your Polish Stay on longer. I will post an update on the longevity of the wear of the gel polish.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel B

customer_reviews.title: Already paid for itself!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for me and my friends to do our nails. As a gel manicure costs me $30 USD, the three of us doing our nails ONCE paid for this. And I'm impressed with the quality of the polish. Sure, the bottles are smaller than standard nail polish but there's plenty of variety and I imagine we will be bored of the colors and ready to buy new ones once we finish the little bottles so it's honestly the perfect size. The best part of us all getting together and having a nail painting party, we can actually sit together, chat, enjoy snacks and drinks together. The experience is much more preferable over a professional manicure.
customer_reviews.author: G. Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: My daughters have had so much fun with this polish
customer_reviews.text: My daughters have had so much fun with this polish. It is best for long nails, because then you get the bi-color look. The nail-bed is warmer than the part of your nail that sticks out so you get try color. But even if your nails are shorter the color change is fun and both daughters had success growing their nails out a bit because of less breakage. Will chip under heavy use...so we of course have to apply often.
customer_reviews.author: rainsrabble

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product... I never bother writing reviews but I have to for this polish... I'm a femal mechanic I have long nails and I hate my hands to look bad when I leave work.. regular polish never makes it through a day without coming off... I ordered this just hoping for a day or two... I have had the polish on two weeks it still looks perfect except where my nails have grown out.. my nails haven't broken any not only does it look amazing but it protects my nails from a very hard job... Very easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: jessy

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great customer service. Will definitely be buying more products from them. I'm still learning how to use gel polish but the directions that come with it are super simple.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Richie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Fun colors!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The color changing really works!!! I was surprised at how much came with it and how nice the product was for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Teenage Girls
customer_reviews.text: Me and my daughters love this!! They really change colors and the polish lasts a long time! The pricing isn't bad for the kit either considering that they send you everything you need with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Everything's smaller than I expected but other than that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Super Impressed! I am in love! Very easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: I am obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this polish! I was worried that the polish wouldn’t change color much because I have short nails but it is constantly changing. I love it so much. It was easy to put on and stays on really well! My hands are cold half the time so the color is always changing. So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Dalena M. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Value for money, beginner friendly
customer_reviews.text: Love it! First time getting a gel manicure, so i didn't know what to expect. It was easy to use. It came with everything u need. Satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Suli

customer_reviews.title: ... YouTube videos on it I decided to buy it best money I’ve ever spent highly recommend buy it now
customer_reviews.text: I was A little hesitant to buy the kit but after watching a few YouTube videos on it I decided to buy it best money I’ve ever spent highly recommend buy it now !!!!😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jones

customer_reviews.title: OMgosh so fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's Christmas and this stuff is amazing :D Her nails change throughout the day- purple when her fingers are cool and pink when she's warm. I did mine after seeing how good hers worked. Mine are sparkly demin blue when cool and they are clear sparkles when warm :) The gel feels strong like it will last a long time. I will try to update in about a week regarding chipping. The UV light worked great and dried each coat quickly. So far we are super happy with this polish!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. First time I've done hell, myself. I get lots of compliments on the color. When you put your hands under the lights, you should do it 3 times on a cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Its GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is going to save me SO MUCH MONEY and aggravation! Its GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Tray

customer_reviews.title: Overall surprisingly great buy!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned about the quality and sizes of everything but boy was I wrong! All the colors are beautiful and apply very well. The light is tiny and perfect! It works great and works pretty fast. I love the little brunch and the wipes do their job. Wished the bottles of polish were a bit bigger until I realized just how little I needed to coat my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Dries quick
customer_reviews.text: The nail polish are small.. dries quickly and the colors are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: shonca daniels

customer_reviews.title: Initial Skepticism Proves Wrong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with a bit of skepticism, thinking there was no way for this price j could do my nails at home with quality results. I was wrong! This product works great and I love all the colors. They require a few coats, but once applied they last forever. I'm really impressed. The nail tools that come with the kit aren't half bad either. The quality of the tools aren't top grade, but the fact that you get both the lamp and the polishes for this price is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Paige A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing polish!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color changing polish, I think it looks better on long nails. But super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Miceli

customer_reviews.title: Great costumer service
customer_reviews.text: I love it i used to do my daughters nails and she loves it also great costumer service i was missing some stuff they sent me a whole new one plus the reply super fast
customer_reviews.author: queteimporta

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This was a great for a beginner, everything was easy to use and the colors were fun. Great price. My daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price even though led light is small
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Good for gel polish beginners
customer_reviews.text: It was great overall but the nail filer it came with was terrible bent and crumbled the first use and also my polish messed up within two days on two of my fingers but it’s an easy fix. The led lamp was small and so were the nail polishes but that’s to be expected and I still think it’s worth it for the price, it’s a very cute little starter kit for gel polish beginners so overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: A Bronx Family

customer_reviews.title: It was nice
customer_reviews.text: It did it’s job. I didn’t like the purple colored ones tho. They weren’t that good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was packaged nicely, and in great condition, I love it all! Really good quality
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law . I painted her nails for her birthday with it and then let her keep it. She loved it ! Bottles of gel polish could be a bit bigger though .
customer_reviews.author: Jermiya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: As someone who had never done nails this was such a great, easy to use kit. Super affordable. I still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney R Boyd

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite beauty products
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this set up for my nails. I had never done my own gel nails before but definitely wanted to learn. My first go at it I slipped up on the steps and got dog hair in them. Second time, nice set up in the bathroom, went perfectly and I really love my nails. The colors change gels are so fun, I can’t stop playing with them. Plus my nails don’t feel as thick as acrylics, and very naturally durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bundle
customer_reviews.text: It does what it states. Absolutely in love with this purchase. Works great nicely packaged! Will buy again in the future for myself and maybe as gifts. Must buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these colors. I am always getting compliments when I have one of these colors on.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nails everytime!
customer_reviews.text: Colors are so pretty and it's great for busy people who dont have time to wait for polish to dry quick and easy to use 💙
customer_reviews.author: derika

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works very well the color transitions nicely and so far it has lasted 16 days with no cracks or chips.
customer_reviews.author: Christyn Gephart

customer_reviews.title: Great for making nails pretty and different.
customer_reviews.text: Got for my niece who likes to look different and try new types of products.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m beyond happy with my purchase!! Simple directions, and nails turn out beautiful! I’ll save so much money doing my nails at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and didn’t get the colors that are pictured. Total bummer ** I am editing my original review because I think I did get some resemblance of the colors pictured but 1) they aren't clearly marked so it's hard to tell which is which and 2) the quality is poor so it takes many, many coats to get the color pictured. Anyone who has done nails knows that too many coats can increase the chance of peeling. The light is also more of a toy than a real light. I ended up buying a better light, polish, and top coat elsewhere. The rest of the kit is decent but it's basically just nail shaping tools.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyRenee

customer_reviews.title: Takes your time and remember to cure after each application for the time it requires.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that everything came with the kit. If you follow the steps it will come out amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Shaye

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing got me brownie points
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it for a good starter kit amazing colors .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mcalister

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit, very pretty colors and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tov Henderson

customer_reviews.title: So love this kit very pleased great price has everything you ...
customer_reviews.text: So love this kit very pleased great price has everything you need would buy again super happy lamp is a little small in size but still works great glad i chose this set also ordered more of their colors very happy with those as well great job guys
customer_reviews.author: aimee farley

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: It came with Everything for my girlfriend to do her own nails! Works wonderfully! Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Lee

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Since it was my first time using this type of polish I was pretty impressed! I even put it on my daughters nails and hers lasted even longer than mine did. It is well worth it for what you get and you won't be disappointed. Only thing I might have to buy is another base and top coat as for some reason they became really thick and so don't go on as smoothly anymore, other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: just

customer_reviews.title: Cute, portable, and affordable! On the go fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set!! So easy and portable! Mini nail polishes but it’s worth the money!! I used it at work I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jelly

customer_reviews.title: Lamp is equivalent to garbage
customer_reviews.text: The lamp that came with this set needs to get thrown in the garbage. My lamp cannot work without the charging wire attached to it and now even with the charging wire, it is not working at all. Otherwise the kit is beautiful and very nice. I suggest that others purchase the nail polish and buy the lamp separately. The nail polish is garbage too. Just save your money and buy gel polish and one lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Darling

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was good.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is good for a beginner. I would suggest that only two coats of color be used. I have also noticed that each coat needs to be cured longer than the directions say, but overall this a good kit to start with. *** edited. I’ve ordered different gel polish since and realized that the polish in this kit is way thicker than it should be. It lifts and peels off after only a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying anything like this, I absolutely love it! It’s so easy, the colors are amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: Nail polish is very thick. When you do finally get it set it starts peeling a day or so later and completely comes off. Not worth the time of applying it then waiting for it to set just for it to come off the next dayor so.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Czebieniak

customer_reviews.title: This is super cool. So happy
customer_reviews.text: This is super cool. So happy ! My finger nails look great. Will do my toe nails soon. Looks like I went to a salon. LOVE THE MONEY I WILL SAVE
customer_reviews.author: LOIS COOK

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit light only fits 4 fingers. I was great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and easy to do at home... just takes so long for the polish to cure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. Everything is mini/travel sized, but for the price I cannot complain. The color changing polished work very well and some have glitter in them which is super cute. I can’t complain honestly 🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Great if you’re just learning
customer_reviews.text: Bottles are very small, and the light turns off to fast. It’s works though.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus H.

customer_reviews.title: Try this Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit for beginners, instructions were easy to follow. I am amazed how easy it was to use and looks professionally done. The fun part is when I wash my hands, color changes from bright pink to light pink. I can’t wait to try the other colors in my kit.
customer_reviews.author: Lekiliana Hanalei

customer_reviews.title: Great home system
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the manicure last. I ordered this at the beginning of quarantine because I couldn’t stand to look at my nails any longer. I must say I’m very pleased and will continue to do my own mani/pedi at home and save myself the salon trip and money. I ordered other colors as well and I am very pleased with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product looked great online, but once received looked very different. The light that was included was like a kid toy. My daughter has only used it once and then put in her cabinet. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Love2shop

customer_reviews.title: Will order again.
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Perfect set! Great product, polish is the best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: EMY

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Junk junk junk! Polishes were unusable because they were clumped together and had consistency of thick Elmer’s glue. I’ve light is a slim piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Diedre Denise kovatch

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The UV light is amazing and compatible. The gel that comes with is cheap and lifts quickly. The color changes color according to temperature, which is trendy.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Nail polish is not good at all
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s easy to use but the polish starts chipping off a few days after they are done. I have my nails Professionally done and the Gail polish last a lot longer then this.
customer_reviews.author: The Ez 217

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! The polish is not tacky afterwards if you do thin layers and let it cure. Be patient and the results are amazing!! Gave it 4 stars though because I got two of the red glitter (which I will never use) and a color from another set. Recieved 5 bottles of color just not all the colors that are pictured. Besides that, I like this kit.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaRena

customer_reviews.title: It was OK
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product mainly for the nail color. Some of the Nail polish was old and clumpy so I didn't use that particular one. I get why some of the reviews were negative because of the peeling off factor the next day, but I also think that's the users mistake. The Light was way smaller than expected. Price was ok. I would like a new color since the color I really wanted was so clumpy. But what ever. I am looking to buy a bigger light later.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Soar

customer_reviews.title: For kids maybe
customer_reviews.text: The product was nice, however the polish was very little, it was too thick and the solid color polished came off in less than 24 hours. I just gave it to my girls.
customer_reviews.author: QuiQui

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This polish hold up well, my only thing is some of the colors I ordered arwnt what I received.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina waters

customer_reviews.title: Be sure of size you want
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then I thought it would be but works well for the size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Colors only get dark when the temperature gets cold. Led light is very cheap. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marchia Mickens

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set! It was great for a beginning set! The light wasn’t great but it worked well enough. Especially for the price. And I loved the color change. It actually worked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Like the whole nail set and all but the UV/LED light DID NOT work at all. I even tried to use several different wires, adapters, and wall mounts. HIGHLY upset!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: emma jones

customer_reviews.title: Nail Polish bottles are TINY!
customer_reviews.text: The LED light is basically the only thing worth the $. The nail polish bottles are very tiny. The picture is misleading. But hey, I got a LED light out of it. ><
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! When I first opened the bag I was shocked at how much came with it! I literally felt like a professional that could be thrown into a salon!! And the lamp works really well! I noticed that when curing the colored polish it felt tacky and like it wasn’t dry. That all goes away when the top coat goes on!! Great great product for a wonderful price! The only thing holding it back from getting 5 stars is that the lamp is so so little haha. It’s the mini version I suppose for a reason. Still great!!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy Menzel

customer_reviews.title: Takes practice but the kit is great!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it’s super difficult at first but easy to master after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: What you see is truly what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! Just wow. I am very impressed with what this vendor had to offer. As shown I received everything. On the constructive criticism end, I'd strongly suggest a bigger and powerful UVLED lamp. It took me 10 minutes for each hand to dry.
customer_reviews.author: lashqueen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little set for the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly how decribed and works well it a nice little kit if you are just starting out will the gel nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it Love it love it. It was great gift for my wife. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Catfish88

customer_reviews.title: Polish not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The UV lamp and the entire kit is pretty good but the Polish itself is on the lower side
customer_reviews.author: ODB

customer_reviews.title: It was alright
customer_reviews.text: Nail polish is on the thicker side. The cord for the light is super short. My daughter loved the changing colors.
customer_reviews.author: LaceyHawks

customer_reviews.title: Good colors. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gel polish set. I love the colors and the color change effect. My only complaint is the purple doesn't change to pink when its warm like the picture shows. It turns more of a lighter purple. Other than that it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBair

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has been great! The UV lamp is small but works amazing and is easy to store!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Romero

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but the lamp was missing the stand/legs. I have to hold the lamp to cure the polish. Other than that, it’s great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stardustrde001

customer_reviews.title: Colors are dull and peel almost immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I used the product 1 time. The colors are not as bright as the product shows. After painting and following directions exactly, the polish peeled off in a single sheet. Would not recommend. Missed the window to return or I would.
customer_reviews.author: LaRonda Barris

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality of the products is very poor, the colors shown are not the colors i received and i dont like the colors I was sent at all and I wouldn't waste my time or money on them and I'm saddened that I did.
customer_reviews.author: jami

customer_reviews.title: Get better polish that last
customer_reviews.text: Polish an brush to big an the paint didn’t last 10mins
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Colors mistake
customer_reviews.text: Not the colors advertised. I got three polish in the same color (black ) and two other ones that I don’t even need because I already have those colors. I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot of things for the price, but the quality of everything was a bit off for me. Everything worked fine, but just remember you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a wonderful kit!! i love it! wears well
customer_reviews.author: Renee Jahlas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I live this kit, and for the price of one manicure at the salon you can get beautiful nails every week!

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: All bottles leaked and so sticky had to go buy new colors and top and base coat. Very very displeased
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this set! I just wish there were more options on colors. I bought the set because it was super cheap compared to others but not a fan of a couple of the colors! Overall definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bownes

customer_reviews.title: Comes off after like 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: I like color changing polish but this one kept falling off and or peeling off. It is just kinda annoying that it comes off in like 3 hours
customer_reviews.author: Pam Becker

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Bought thinking it would be a great starter kit. The nail polish sucks and the uv light was to small for my hand. Not worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Led lamp didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The uv/led lamp didn't work. The nail polish is pretty bit can't do anything with it until I get a new uv/led lamp
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: She LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 12 yr old Gbaby for her birthday!!! She LOVED it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Gillett

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The nail polish was old and didn’t apply well the cleanser pads were dried out waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective products
customer_reviews.text: The top coat spealed and messed up the other bottles. It was not sealed properly This has to be replaced. Please get back to me I just ordered this
customer_reviews.author: Ezinne

customer_reviews.title: was exactly what I expected it to be
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money, was exactly what I expected it to be- easy, fun, and handy. Great for beginners/user friendly. No complaints other than the fact that UV dry time takes longer than advertised, even for thin coats of paint.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything except the light. Personal opinion is the light doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: browneyes

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think you're getting
customer_reviews.text: The colors did not dry consistently. One had gold glitter but left wired streaks of pink when it dried even with such a thin coat
customer_reviews.author: William James Hooker jr

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The gel peels off and the lamp quit working. Extremely cheap.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter kit...
customer_reviews.text: This pack comes with tons of useful stuff, but the lamp is soo not useful. It took almost 10 minutes to cure my nails. I will be purchasing a stronger lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: The gel polish does not last
customer_reviews.text: The kit is nice but after trying the nail polish, it lasted 1 week and started to peel off around the edges but actually taking the polish off was very difficult. I had to scrape my nail after soaking in acetone for 20 minutes....... Not good. It also did not come with any alcohol wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: SEXY MIX Gel Nail Polish Kit with UV LED Light, Home Gel Nail Polish Kit Manicure Tools 5 Colors Changing Gel Nail Polish Base and Top Coat, Portable Kit for Travel
feature_bullets: ❤Sexy Mix Gel Polish Starter Kit: Includes mini nail dryer lamp, manicure tools, 4 colors gel polish, base and top coat. Ideal and portable kit for DIY at home or travel. Stop wasting money on salon, you can enjoy it well by yourself with this kit.
❤Folding Mini UV LED Lamp: Connect to USB. Press the button to start a 45s curing time. Press the button for about 2s for a 60s curing time..
❤Basic Manicure Tools: Provide you a complete nail art process from preparation, apply gel polish, gel remover to nail nutrition.
❤Popular 5 Color-changing Gel Polish + Base Top Coat: Feel magic of color change at different temperature. Durable and last about 2 weeks in proper way.
